Detailed Description

Define Data structures and ioctl commands to pass between the driver and the user space. The definitions serve as the interface between the kernel and user.

NOTE: This file is included in source code built for the kernel and user. It must be kept compatible with both environments. In particular, structure definitions can not be changed in one space without recompiling the code in the other space.

Definition in file lscpcie/Ioctl.h.

Define Documentation

#define IOCTL_LSCPCIE2_GET_EXTRA_INFO   _IOR(LSCPCIE_MAGIC, 3, ExtraResourceInfo_t)
 

This IO_CTL is used to get additional information from the driver back to user space applications. This info is used by the SFIF.
